full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 189 of 228 865 LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct 1 A. Okay. 2 Q. Is your name in that book? 3 A. No, my name is not in the book. 4 Q. Is your wife's name in that book? 5 A. No. 6 Q. Is Sarah Kellen's name in that book? 7 A. Excuse me? 8 Q. Is Sarah Kellen, is her name in the book? 9 A. No. 10 Q. Do you want to go ahead and take a look at that book, please, and tell me if you see Sarah Kellen's name in it? 12 THE COURT: Just a moment. 13 He's looking at the binder. 14 MS. COMEY: Oh, no. May I approach, your Honor? 15 THE COURT: You may. 16 MR. PAGLIUCA: Your Honor, I'm going to object to this process. He answered no, and this is essentially a leading question to change the answer. 19 THE COURT: I'll sustain the leading objection. But otherwise, I'll allow it. Well, I'll permit the question that you asked. So I'll allow the question, which is, is Sarah Kellen's name in the book? 22 23 MS. COMEY: I think I'm asking him to look in the exhibit. 24 25 MR. PAGLIUCA: And that's my objection, your Honor. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018062
